```{r setup}
# Libraries:

library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)


# Constants:

ROOT_DIR <- ".."
DATA_DIR <- "dat"
DATASET_FILENAME <- file.path(DATA_DIR, "synchros-initiatives-20211112.xlsx")

opts_knit$set(root.dir = ROOT_DIR)

```


```{r load-data}
iipc_data <- read_excel(DATASET_FILENAME, na = c("NA", "na"))

iipc_data <- iipc_data |> select(
  -harmonizedDatasets # All values are 0
)

iipc_data |> select(
  acronym,
  name,
  region,
  countries,
  description,
  methodology.nbCohorts.total,
  methodology.nbCohorts.harmonized,
  methodology.moreCohortsToBeHarmonized,
  nbParticipants.total,
  nbParticipants.harmonized,
  age.min,
  age.max,
  methodology.nbHarmonizedVariables,
  cohortCriteria
)
```
